channel.title: What is your opinion toward old servers?
channel.description:
No I'm not referring to old-school servers, but old servers that we used to call "Silab servers", "MoparScape server", "Allstarscape", "Project-Czar"?
Personally I liked the way it was build up, it was unique and custom, I don't give two balls if the server was poorly programmed, it's the gameplay that matters.

item.title: What is your opinion toward old servers?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Those aren’t old.

Project 16 ++

I liked them. But that’s because this community wasn’t full of skiddies. (well, it was, just not to this extent)

The servers released these days follow the EBTKS mentality. Which is sad.

Read full topic
item.source: What is your opinion toward old servers?

item.title: What is your opinion toward old servers?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:7, topic:399250”]login, own everyone online.

Never log back in.

The days when servers weren’t run for profit.[/quote]

[quote=“marcbob, post:9, topic:399250”]I liked when people didn’t use the same source and only the people who actually knew what they were doing would host servers.

Older servers are my favorites because they are actually original.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: What is your opinion toward old servers?

item.title: What is your opinion toward old servers?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

good times, they were only coded to what the coder wants, its just a server,you login and play and master all 99’s in a few hours.

everything did sucked back then, but without the past how would we get the future of what we have today?

Read full topic
item.source: What is your opinion toward old servers?

item.title: What is your opinion toward old servers?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

CoonHunter:

Old servers, I played the original Frugooscape made by Al before he had 4 worlds setup. About the oldest thing I played lol.

Frugooscape was terrible, it was a spawn-and-pk server.

item.title: What is your opinion toward old servers?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:17, topic:399250”][quote author=Ajdakiwii link=topic=496387.msg3630383#msg3630383 date=1308168653]

I’ve always loved these servers, one time I went to Cape Cod for a vacation for a week with my step-brother and we just played

these kinds of server 24/7, so we basically wasted our vacation playing them. Oh, and this goes in the General Discussion section.

Wrong. He is asking our opinion, asking = question = general questions
[/quote]

Well this is discussing people’s opinions.[/quote]

Hence why General Questions is a subforum of General Discussion

Read full topic
